short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly estimate revenue for most Amazon products with real-time data insights. Based on public last month sales and prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 RevCalc for Amazon - Easily Estimate Last Month's Revenue.

Stay informed on product revenue with just a click.

This free chrome extension is designed for Amazon sellers, dropshippers, and market researchers to quickly estimate product revenue based on sales data (last month sales x current price). With an easy-to-use interface, you can save products, optimize pricing strategies, and improve overall market analysis.

🎯 Features:

🔍 Automated Revenue Estimation
Instantly gather pricing data and estimate revenue for Amazon products. The extension calculates estimated revenue based on last month’s sales and price, both publicly available. All done automatically, if the data is available.

📋 Personal Dashboard & Notes
Organize your estimated revenue and sales data in one central dashboard with options to add personal notes for each product.

🔎 Comprehensive Product Data Across Regions
Collect revenue estimates across various Amazon marketplaces for a complete view of each product’s performance.

🔐 Privacy First
All your research data stays private and is not stored on our servers.

🖥️ Seamless Browser Integration
Install directly into your browser and access product revenue estimates smoothly while you browse Amazon.

🎁 Completely Free to Use: Enjoy all the features without any cost – no hidden fees.

Disclaimer: This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with Amazon or any of its associated companies. The software may occasionally contain errors. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently. A free license key is required to activate and use the extension.
